text: He amadera raba! Ami amara bansadharadera kichu sankhyakake basabasa karalama [1] anurbara upatyakaya [2] apanara pabitra gharera kache [3], he amadera raba! E jan'ya ye, tara yena salata kayema kare [4]. Ata'eba apani kichu lokera antara tadera prati anuragi kare dina [5] ebam phala-phaladi diye tadera riyakera byabastha karuna [6], yate tara krtajnata prakasa kare
